name: Free Navalny message
description:
Alexei Anatolievich Navalny (Russian: Алексей Анатольевич Навальный) is a Russian opposition leader, lawyer, and anti-corruption activist. He has organised anti-government demonstrations and run for office to advocate reforms against corruption in Russia, and against president Vladimir Putin and his government. Navalny is the leader of the founder of the Anti-Corruption Foundation (FBK). He is recognised by Amnesty International as a prisoner of conscience.
He is imprisoned since early 2021.
